items.title: Canada needs agency to manage public UFO sightings, says new federal report
items.summary: A new federal report in Canada recommends the creation of a government agency to manage public UFO sightings, emphasizing the need for a formal response system. This initiative aims to address the ethical implications of UFO reports and provide a structured approach to handling such phenomena.
